title: Shutter Safari: Virtual Edition 2.0
description: Shutter Safari ‚Äì Virtual Edition 2.0 is a photography competition that celebrates photography as a powerful medium of storytelling, emotion, and cultural expression. The event aims to provide students with a professional and supportive platform to showcase their work while promoting ethical, original, and story-driven photography.

title: Workshop on Wildlife Photography by Apoorva Jadon
description: Join us for an engaging session with Apoorva Jadon, An award-winning wildlife photographer & conservation advocate who uses photography to build awareness, empathy, and respect for the wildlife üêæ and has been featured by National Geographic India.

title: Workshop on Wildlife Photography by Amey Namdeo Thakare
description: Learn how real stories from wildlife are captured quietly, patiently, and ethically. with Amey Namdeo Thakare, A wildlife photographer & filmmaker who lets nature breath and speak. Hiswork includes The Tale of Bor River Dam (2024)  and has been featured by BBC Wildlife Magazine & Nature InFocus üì∏

title: Festive Frames: Diwali Edition
description: The festival that fills every corner with light. This Diwali, PAUSE for a moment & capture the little moments, like the quiet beauty that shines beyond the diyas!!

title: Lumina Frames üå∏
description: Capture your favorite Navratri & Dussehra moments in one magical clip. No experience, no limits ‚Äì just the festive vibe!
collab: IRIS Society x Pixels N Panels

title: Shutter Safari: Saavan Edition
description: Shutter Safari: Saavan Edition is IRIS Society's flagship photography competition, continuing the legacy from Paradox and Margazhi. Features two rounds: Street Stories (street photography) and Beyond the Visible (abstract photography), with expert judging celebrating storytelling and technical artistry.

title: Workshop on Cinematic Storytelling by Siddharth Nuni
description: inFocus Workshop Series - Join Siddharth Nuni, a visual storyteller and IIT Madras alumnus, as he shares his expertise in cinematic storytelling and the art of capturing compelling narratives through photography.

title: Workshop on Cinematic Potential by Shanti Bhushan Roy
description: inFocus Workshop Series - Dive into the world of cinematic storytelling with Shanti Bhushan Roy, a master in capturing the essence of moments through his lens.

title: Workshop on Architectural Photography by Rejoy Krishnan
description: inFocus Workshop Series - Explore the art of capturing architectural beauty with Rejoy Krishnan, renowned for his work in the fields of Fashion, Potraits, and Architecture Photography.

title: Workshop on Portrait Photography by Nishant Ratnakar
description: inFocus Workshop Series - Learn storytelling, lighting, and the power of a single impactful shot with the lens behind Forbes India and Fortune India.

title: Workshop on Creative Vision by Adwaith Shine
description: inFocus Workshop Series - From Coca-Cola to Hyundai, CUMAC‚Äôs visual wizard Adwaith Shine shares how to carve your unique photographic identity.

title: Green Tales, Van Mahotsava Competition
description: Capture the spirit of Van Mahotsav through photos, videos, or words and raise your voice for nature, biodiversity, and climate action.
